import React from "react"; export default function Products() { const images = [ "JendycoFields1.jpg", "Jendycoffee-Branch2.JPG", "Jendycoffee-branch.JPG", "Jendycocoffeebeans-closeup.JPG", "JendycoCoffee-Branch3.JPG", "JendycoCacao-Branch3.JPG", "JendycoCacao-Branch2.JPG", "JendycoCacao-Branch.JPG", ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Our Products

{/* Featured Cards */}
{/* Coffee */}

Coffee Beans

Our Arabica coffee is handpicked from high-altitude Peruvian farms, delivering rich, smooth flavors for premium roasters worldwide.

{/* Cacao */}

Cacao Beans

Sourced from Peru's fertile valleys, our cacao is prized for deep chocolate notes, purity, and sustainability — trusted by global chocolatiers.

{/* Pima Cotton */}

Pima Cotton

Pima cotton is Peru’s finest — ultra-soft, durable, and eco-conscious. Jendyco delivers direct from grower to manufacturer.

{/* Gallery Section */}

In the Field

{images.map((img, index) => (
))}
); }
